name: HiFit|#1HomeWorkoutsSkill
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hi fit
des:
Turn Alexa into a Smart Personal trainer with HiFit Fitness Skill.

This skill provides you a daily High Intensity Interval Training (HIIT) workout, no equipment is required: all you need is your body, the right mindset and 10-15 minutes of your time.

In HiFit you can find:
• A Daily Workout you can do at home with family and friends.
• 12 Workouts designed by a team of experienced Fitness Coaches and Professional Athletes.
• 8 Bodyweight Exercises with Audio Instructions and Video Tutorials.
• Workout listening to your own music, just play your music before starting the skill.

If the workout is too hard for you, you can always ask HiFit for a little break, but remember: No pain, no gain. 

Do you want more ? Go PREMIUM and you will get:
• A Personalized Training Plan tailored to your needs
• 50+ Workouts designed by a team of experienced Fitness Coaches and Professional Athletes.
• 30+ Bodyweight Exercises with Audio Instructions and Tutorials.
• 5 Different Levels of Intensity to reach your goal: Lose Weight, Tone your Body, Build Muscles or Get Stronger.

Your opinion is our fuel, if you have any feedback please leave us a review.
So, what is your excuse not to start working on the best version of yourself ?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
